securityCenter_configurationBackup_subti:
You need an up-to-date Configuration Backup to recover your Accounts and Personas if you lose access to them.

Your Backup does not contain your keys or seed phrase.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_autom: Automated Configuration Backup not working. Check internet connection and iCloud settings.
Automated Configuration Backup not working. Check internet connection and Google Drive settings.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_accou: Your list of Accounts and the Factors required to recover them
securityCenter_configurationBackup_perso: Your list of Personas and the Factors required to recover them. Also your Persona data.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_secur: The list of Security Factors you need to recover your Accounts and Personas.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_walle: Your general settings, such as trusted dApps, linked Connectors and wallet display settings.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_autom: Without an updated Configuration Backup, you won’t be able to recover your Accounts.
securityCenter_configurationBackup_manua: You can export your own Configuration Backup file and save it locally
You’ll need to export a new Backup file each time you make a change in your wallet.
